name: Hiker Gal
review: Covenantal, reformed worship with liturgy and worshipful hymns. PCA but strong in reformed doctrine.

name: David Cimino
review: A loving (and growing) church family. Traditional Reformed Worship. Expository preaching. A great place to nurture one's faith!

name: Ruth Mills
review: Warm friendly congregation. Gentle non-compromising preaching of Jesus & The Word.
